Details.name: Umendra Pardhi
Details.careerObjective: Motivated and detail-oriented aspiring full stack developer, eager to apply my skills in creating user-friendly web solutions. Committed to learning and contributing to impactful projects as I begin my career in web development.

Skills.Remark: Developed Online Service Center Website and several Pages
Developed Terminal styled Portfolio Website, HTML Editor, Unit Converter
Developed GPA Converter for DBATU, ServiceLinkPro, Ananymo Website
Developed Excel to Vcf converter, TrigLink
Developed SlideSync an Android app that helps to control PPT slides Remotely
Developed SlideSync Server Desktop app that helps to control PPT slides Remotely
The Brand of Beauty E-commerce Website

Projects.Title: SlideSync
Projects.Description: SlideSync lets you control PowerPoint slides from your Android phone via Wi-Fi. With an Android app to send commands and a PC app to receive them, you can navigate slides easily, making presentations hassle-free.

Projects.Title: GPA Converter
Projects.Description: An easy-to-use GPA converter for DBATU students, simplifying CGPA, percentage, grade, and SGPA conversions.

Projects.Title: Excel to VCF Converter
Projects.Description: Excel to VCF Converter is a tool that enables seamless conversion of Excel contacts to VCF format, allowing users to import and share contact lists across Android and iOS with a single click.
Projects.TechStack: Node.js, Express.js, HTML, CSS, Javascript, JSON

Projects.Title: Ananymo
Projects.Description: Ananymo is a community-driven platform where tech enthusiasts and developers collaborate to solve coding challenges and share knowledge.

Achievements.Title: Lead Developer at GCOEY CODING CLUB
Secretary, Computer Engineering Student Association (CESA) at GCOEY
